With its innovative features and superior quality, it's truly a game-changer. For a limited time, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $85. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
